entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration test fails on windows x86 leg #97255
  • In a blazor wasm component, CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo("tr-TR").DateTimeFormat.DayNames returns not the Turkish names, but English day names #97252
  • Random System.IO.FileNotFoundException for runtime components #97251
  • .net 8.0.1 but reports 8.0.0 on arm 32 #97250
  • JIT: maybe reconsider multiple def CSEs #97243
    Future
  • If an attempt to acquire a System.Threading.Lock ends up throwing, we should leave the lock unlocked. #97240

Closed

  • Test failure Interop\\MarshalAPI\\IUnknown\\IUnknownTest\\IUnknownTest.cmd #85234
    9.0.0
  • Add CreateLogger<T> to ILoggerFactory #97139
    Future
  • Unable to resolve service for type '...' while attempting to activate '...'. #97239
  • Test failing: System.Globalization.Tests.CompareInfoHashCodeTests.CheckHashingOfSkippedChars #97241
  • System.IO.Pipelines Specified argument was out of the range of valid values (Thread safety) #97247
  • Assertion failed 'this->Prev()->KindIs(BBJ_CALLFINALLY)' #97231
    9.0.0
  • Consider adding TaskCompletionSource.SetFromTask(Task) #47998
    9.0.0
  • Process Start method behaving differently #97233
  • BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration test failing in CI #97103
    9.0.0
  • ,NET Core 3.1.32 - ExecuteEngineException (0x80131506) on hostile memory conditions #96275

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the definition of TARGET_BROWSER in CMake #97254
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution, os-browser
  • Various createdump fixes and cleanup #97253
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add additional assert for throw helper blocks #97246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch RuntimeProperties host test to pre-built test assets #97245
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Clean up and consolidate HostModel tests. #97244
    test-enhancement, area-HostModel
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_ED_1A, IF_SVE_EE_1A, IF_SVE_EB_1A, IF_SVE_EC_1A #97238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Merged

  • Frozen objects should be identified as Gen2 in the handle table #97109
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove Compiler::fgIsBetterFallThrough #97222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop tracking `genReturnBB` after global morph #97130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [coreclr] Block test that should not be run #97248
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, blocking-clean-ci
  • Reduce defensive copying in PublicKey #97108
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][interp] Small code refactoring for SSA #97249
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add TaskCompletionSource.SetFromTask #97077
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove some timeouts and reorganize tests #97115
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Add public APIs for persisted AssemblyBulder #97177
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add an internal mode to `Lock` to have it use non-alertable waits #97227
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Late cast expansion: remove the null check if possible #97234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Late cast expansion: castclass #97237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Avoid deadlocks in TypeDescriptor #97236
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Add lots more TensorPrimitives operations #97192
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Create directory for Binding Tools For Swift #97208
    area-Meta
  • Get rid of `EETypePtr` #97207
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable riscv64 R2R in installer #96941
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Optimize lsra for MinOpts and enregisterLocalVars is false #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • breaking a string on many lines produce incorrect result if followed by a call #96948
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][mono][debugger] Debugger improvements on .net8 #97160
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Remove old loop code #97232
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #97188
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Content from library is not deployed to UWP app #1690
    Discussion

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add riscv64 in ArchitectureToString() #38148
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun

Updated

  • Update CI #37984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Treat rtm as stable Fixes #36500 #37160
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When opening IntelliSense using Ctrl - J, current item is not in alphabetical order #71745
  • Hide duplicates caused by "starred" items in IntelliSense #71744
  • c# devkit pops up several "request textdocument/definition failed." #71742
  • Missing IDE0001-IDE0003 rules from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle package #71741
  • [Bug]: Overriding a member loses nullability analysis from the original class #71740

Closed

  • Error CS0656 occurs after enabling embed interop types for COM reference in a Class Library (.NET Standard) project #33315
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow Razor to register Json converters for functional tests #71746
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator not generating event field modifiers correctly #71739
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add logging to track down a double dispose #71738
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure we don't leak the request info if a request is cancelled #71737
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make the Roslyn code index CI use the LSIF generator just produced #71736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Another attempt at getting TelemetryLogger working in VSCode #71734
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71735
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update to MicroBuildSigningPlugin V4 #71715
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Simplify the work with generated BoundNodes and emit the xml comments as doc comment in the generated code file #71601
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error : ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE On Blazor Project #53513
  • Async IPooledObjectPolicy<T> #53512
  • DisposeAsync is called too late on page change? #53511
  • Results.Json(null) stopped producing a response body in .NET 8 (and 7) #53509
  • #dotnet #blazor #filesUpload => crash when OnChange occured #53507
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #53506
  • Perf regression: mvc #53505
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid CSS not loading #53504
  • Allow deletion of Data Protection keys #53502

Closed

  • Blazor 8 navigation, when App.razor and Routes.razor not placed in the startup project #53483
  • WebSocketException due to a handshake problem between client and server in Blazor Server App #53498
  • Cannot scaffold Identity due to ambiguous calls between extension methods. #53290
  • Perf improvement: mvc #53493
  • IJSRuntime doesn't Serialize/Deserialize as expected #53465
  • Blazor App Login.razor Provides Input.Email as Username to SignInManager #52983
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #50665
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48185

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty and ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #52897
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Pass template tests when project reference contains ".db" #53476
    area-mvc

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52830
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #52908
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53486
    area-signalr
  • [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53500
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-20

PullRequests

Created

  • added an option to collect rundown events #4470

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FlyoutPage + NavigationPage | Navigation stuck after some time #20032
  • Windows has a max limit for application ID #20031
  • [iOS] Color for SelectedItem of CollectionView not set when SelectedItem is assigned in ViewModel #20030
  • Grid overflows child ContentPage of parent TabbedPage on initial load and when resizing on Windows #20028
  • GestureRecognizers not working for Map control? #20027
  • MAUI .NET 6/7 Library not loaded: @rpath/liblua54.framework/Versions/A/liblua54 #20026
  • ListView is not currently being Garbage Collected #20025
    Backlog
  • SearchBar is not currently being Garbage Collected #20024
    .NET 8 SR3
  • RadioButton is not currently being Garbage Collected #20023
    .NET 8 SR3

Closed

  • Many controls (mainly iOS) are not collected by GC #18365
    .NET 8 SR3

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize Thickness and CornerRadius converters #20033
    community ✨
  • Remove unused functions #20029
    community ✨

Updated

  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Make sure we support keyed services in client apps #20014
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Do not use underscores in the ApplicationId #19377
    area/templates 📄, stale
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, stale
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, stale
  • Optimize resetting gesture recognizers #19987
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    community ✨
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • Reduce casting in TemplateUtilities #19982
    community ✨
  • Enable building WASDK Self-Contained packaged apps #20019
  • Source Generator Performance Improvements #19990
    area/Xaml </>
  • [.NET 9] Reconcile all NET8 //TODO Add this API comments #19996
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/architecture
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Rectify the scopes in the builder #19932
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Make sure to await async test asserts #19994
    area/testing
  • Fixes carouselview layout on iOS #20001
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Fix modal page push in immersive mode #19903
    community ✨, area/modal
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, stale, memory-leak 💦

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FromSqlRaw For InMemory Db working in dotnet 6 but breaking in dotnet 8 #32875
  • IOrderedQueryable projection to record throw exception #32874
  • Clean up TPC handling #32873
  • Multiple DbContext for Single databse #32872

Closed

  • Query: SelectExpression.Update always creates new instance of SelectExpression without checking if anything changed #31276
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Clear _modificationCommandGraph when returning the context to pool #32871

Merged

  • Move all pruning code to the pruner and make it an immutable visitor #32817

Updated

  • Add complex type mappings to the default relational mappings #32867
  • [release/8.0] Use the unpatched shared framework as the minimum requirement for tools. #32869
    Servicing-consider

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add DotNetBuildOrchestrator flag #18306
  • Condition inner-clone properties #18307
